title: Account Name trading
body:
According to https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202647784-Account-Deletion-FAQ
not sure if outdated,
but if I was to ask to trade names between two accounts I own, which accounts rp or blue essence are you going to take?
just realised the article was from 2014, so is account name trading outdated?

replies.body: Given it's a manual process, you can probably request which account you want it taken from. If one account doesn't have enough, they'll presumably take it from the other. I doubt you'd be able to do a split payment tho.
